amendatorysection.para: Pursuant to section 77-2715.01, for all taxable years beginning or deemed to begin on or after January 1, 1990, under the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended, the rate of the income tax levied pursuant to section 77-2715 shall be three and forty-three-hundredths percent. Pursuant to section 77-2715.01, for all taxable years beginning or deemed to begin on or after January 1, 1991, under the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended, the rate of the income tax levied pursuant to section 77-2715 shall be three and seventy-hundredths percent.
